name: Vortoj
description:
Vortoj 

PC game for Windows, Linux, Mac OSX and browser. It is a game of reflex, language and fun. With Vortoj you will practice languages and become more certain about the spelling of words whilst having lots of fun in class, with your friends and colleagues. The game is also well designed for teachers, giving you options of editting the game’s vocabulary, challenging your students in specific ways.

Two player mode

Feeling like giving it a go? Be sure to find yourself another player whos ready to test their language skills against yours!

Dancepad

This game is meant to be played with dancepads. It supports the brand x-pad out of the box and we cannot guarantee out-of-box functionality for other brands. Should you face any difficulties, you can remap the dancepad controls in the options menu. We've got you covered!

If you do not own one, it is also possible to play with WASD and the arrow keys, simulating dancepad arrows, the game however was designed and therefore works best with a proper dancepad.

How To Play

The word is right?

STEP RIGHT

The word is wrong? 

STEP LEFT

The word makes no sense at all? 

STEP FORWARDS AND BACKWARDS AT THE SAME TIME

Languages
  • English
  • Slovak
  • German
  • Spanish
  • Italian
  • French
  • Esperanto
  • Russian
Leaderboards

Each language comes with its own leaderboards which shows the top10 players. This keeps up the competitive spirit of the experience as players get to not only compare but also strive to beat their peers.
